titles.title: A resolution designating September 12, 2009, as "National Day of Encouragement".
A resolution designating September 12, 2009, as "National Day of Encouragement".

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Designates September 12, 2009, as National Day of Encouragement.
